Title: Eddy Locke: The Treasure Hunt
Descriptions: Hey there, Survivor! So, back in the day, I had this habit of stashing loot all over the place. You know, hiding goodies in the weirdest spots, thinking I'd remember where I put 'em. Well, it's been a while since then, and my memory ain't what it used to be. But here's the deal – I've got some caches of loot scattered around Chernarus, and I could use your help finding 'em. I can give you the general areas, but the exact locations might be a bit fuzzy. Think you're up for the challenge? And hey, here's the best part – you get to keep whatever you find! Trust me, the stuff I've hidden is worth the hunt!
